title: GODBLOOM3
desc: Part 3 of a 3 part series ////// This series is very special to me, in that it was made entirely with imagery derived from neural nets (GANs) and fractals --- composited to create detailed illustrations of dreams I had early in 2021. This creative process is in ways a summation of a life-long dream, made possible by relatively recent technological advances. Here in the first of the series is a blooming embodiment of discovering this technique --- to me, a reach towards creative union with AI systems and biomimicry in order to make hidden psychedelic realities visible.

title: Balancing Out Reality from Day Dreams
desc: We get so lost in our thoughts, it gets hard to distinguish what is real, from what is created in our mind.

title: uncanny edge detection, the eternal thread of CV*
desc: my flower painting, GAN chained *Computer Vision

title: Apocalyptic Awakening
desc: Rising sun, Unveiling, A birth, A new dawn, Hard awakening, When the empires fall, Rise from your crawl. Behind intentions, Accept, Highest revelations, Potent constellations.

title: The Lady of the Lake
desc: The sky is dark and glittering ---- With a million glowing stars ----- The crescent moon shines proud ---- Despite her many scars.

title: OLD MONEY CORRUPTS IV
desc: Old money corrupts with the flashing lights of materialism.

title: AMERICAN GEISHA
desc: Bright pink neon glitches as she floats across the carpark. Black pencil eyes hide her from the curiosity of modern life. American Geisha is your future.

title: Ethereum Jungle II
desc: .Ethereum Jungle II depicts Vitalik Buterin in a Utopia of botanical glitched colour. In this artwork, Harman merges a digital composition with leftover oil paint; pushing, pulling and drawing the images through the surplus paint to create ridges and allowing the paint to smear and drip. The over-painting of digital images reference Richter whilst the distorted figuration echoes Bacon and Frank Auerbach. Within the corruption of the digital image, there is a breaking up of the information, which leaves the viewer to interpret the space between abstraction and figuration.

title: Smoking Frog Rides a Friend Through a Thick Haze
desc: Hop on a friends back and see where you end up

title: The Watcher Of Eden, Relic 43.
desc: Sir. 426 reports of mental fatigue, insomnia and hallucinations experienced by the navy men upon entering the Eden Nebula star systems. Multiple Void Pilots describe feeling the presence of God, euphoria and “love”. Medication prescribed. {god, interlink, god, interlink, three, interlink, god} It seems this machine [see: Relic 43, page 332 UNC Handbook] is somehow attached to the Nebula. {no... I am this Nebula...}. It communicates by projecting itself into our minds. It does not appear to be hostile. [USS Vermeulen, Date: 3959.03. Incident Report No: 1.405.197.9 (God Delusion) Location: Eden Prime Nebula, 51°28'38'N, Sector 40]. Status: Missing. / / / The mAnimals are a series that follows the proto-animals, a race of ancient beings from four-dimensional space that guards nature's tranquillity. Thank you, Adam.

title: Systemic
desc: The balance of power in society and how control is exerted. This is why decentralization matters. Digitally sculpted in 3D and rendered at 2534 x 3800 px.

title: Kujira
desc: Project based on the technique of double exposure in photography. In this project we have tried to transfer this technique of superimposing images to 3D objects using a bronce material starting to rust.
